author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Trout With Chilli & Lime Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Trout With Chilli & Lime Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium fresh mediumhot red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the dressing ingredients, tasting as you go. Add all of the lime juice, if needed, or use less if the dressing is becoming too sour.
Divide the smoked trout among 4 serving plates, then toss together the salad leaves, spring onions, and radishes.
When ready to serve, lightly toss the salad with the some of the dressing, and drizzle the remainder over the trout. Serve immediately.
